ch.uzh.ifi.DomainGenerators

Class SpatialDomainGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.DomainGenerators.SpatialDomainGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpatialUncertainDomainGenerator

    public class SpatialDomainGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements functionality for a spatial domain generator (similar to CATS "regions").
    Author:
    Dmitry Moor
